text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Reported US coronavirus deaths in April so far:

4/1: 4,780
4/2: 5,983
4/3: 7,152
4/4: 8,488
4/5: 9,643
4/6: 10,908
4/7: 12,895
4/8: 14,817
4/9: 16,684
4/10: 18,758
4/11: 20,604
Now: 22,073.        Imagine if you had listened to experts & started social distancing measures in Feb
